item.description:
Our member Bernice will be attending this event and has offered to organize the group if you would like to join her. :-)
Thanks Bernice!

6pm Beginner Friendly Swing Dance Lesson
7pm Swing Dance
The Leominster Elks
134 N. Main Street
Leominster, MA
The Velvet Elvis will Play on this Date.

The last time I was there the lesson didn't start till 6:30ish, the band came on around
7:30. Great friendly crowd.
For more info contact Bernice.

I-495 S toward LITTLETON/WORCESTER - go 9.8 mi
Take exit #29B/LEOMINSTER/RT-2 onto RT-2 W - go 14.2 mi
Take exit #31A/LEOMINSTER/RT-12 onto N MAIN ST(RT-12 S) - go
0.8 mi
Arrive at 134 N MAIN ST, LEOMINSTER, on the RIGHT

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Swing Dance and Lessons
